comments:
In detailed pane of variable or register view, using "Ctrl-s" to change the 
value has no validation on the new value. For example: change "0" to "a", 
after ctrl-s, an exception will be generated:

Error May 05, 2005 17:44:40.344 Error logged from Debug UI: 
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Target request failed:
